title: Veetral
content: Photo collage made easy 1. Choose your grid style: You tell how many pieces your veetral will have choosing between grids. 2. Select the pieces: Tap in the squares you want to snap first and hit the camera button. 3. Complete the photo: Do the same of the second step until the whole picture is done. 4. Share it as you like: Use your social medias or private messaging to your friends and family or just save it to your Camera Roll.
